TestGroupDocumentation.Title: Element names contain digits followed by a non-digit characters. (content tree test)
TestGroupDocumentation.Description: Declare an element with a sequence of three integer elements. Name them as follows: "aa111a2Aa", "aa22B3c", "aa3-4_". The document name00803_p.xml sets the elements to 0, 1 and 2 respectively.

TestCaseDocumentation.Title: General check of the get method.
TestCaseDocumentation.Description: The test unmarshals name00803_p.xml and expects the returned object to contain elements to be set to 0, 1 and 2 respectively.
TestCaseDocumentation.Author: Evgueni Rouban

TestCaseDocumentation.Title: General check of the set method.
TestCaseDocumentation.Description: The test unmarshals name00803_p.xml, sets its elements to values 11, 22, 33 and expects the returned object to contain elements to be set to 11, 22 and 33 respectively.
TestCaseDocumentation.Author: Evgueni Rouban
